title: Hello i'm looking for that font in the title ... "PICTURE RIO: WHY SO MANY BRAZILIANS HATE THE WORLD CUP" I'm in love with that "Z"
author: Robertorf

comments.content: It looks like **[Raisonne (DemiBold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725022430/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/raisonne/about-font)** by Benjamin Critton [Colophon, 2010]
